ShadowAbsoluteLayout, ShadowAdapterView, ShadowFrameLayout, ShadowLinearLayout, ShadowMapView, ShadowRelativeLayout
@Implements(value=android.view.ViewGroup.class)
public class ShadowViewGroup
extends ShadowView
